title: SSW
body: Hey guys was just wondering does anyone know when the ssw skins will be out again?

replies.body:
The SSW Skins came out to honor Samsung White's when they won in the World Finals back in 2014. We come out with new skins based on the winning team each year, but the old ones still come back as legacy skins every now and then. 

You can check out our [Limited and Legacy Skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins) guide to see which skins are classified as limited or legacy!
probably close to the world championship when all teamskins come back. maybe also during msi but i dont know for sure.
